ChangeList.Description: Added the **itemInsights** navigation property to the **organizationSettings** entity.

Added the **itemInsightsSettings** entity and the following operations: ,  [Get itemInsightSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/iteminsightssettings-get?view=graph-rest-beta) ,  [Update itemInsightSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/iteminsightssettings-update?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added the **profileCardProperties** navigation property to the [organizationSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organizationsettings?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the **profileCardProperty** entity and the following operations: ,  [List](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/organizationsettings-list-profilecardproperties) ,  [Create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/organizationsettings-post-profilecardproperties) ,  [Get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/profilecardproperty-get?view=graph-rest-beta) ,  [Update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/profilecardproperty-update?view=graph-rest-beta) ,  [Delete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/profilecardproperty-delete).

Insights API is available in v1.0. This includes the [officeGraphInsights](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/officegraphinsights?view=graph-rest-1.0), [trending](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/insights-trending?view=graph-rest-1.0), [usedInsight](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/insights-used?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [sharedInsight](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/insights-shared?view=graph-rest-1.0) resources, and related types and methods. See [Why integrate with document-based insights?](social-intel-concept-overview.md#why-integrate-with-document-based-insights) for more information.
Added the [profile API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/profile?view=graph-rest-beta) and associated methods.

Introduced the new workplace intelligence [analytics API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/useranalytics?view=graph-rest-beta) that enables you to get analytics about how users spend their time on various activities during and outside of working hours, including calls, chats (instant messages), emails, focus work, and meetings.

Introduced the new workplace intelligence [settings API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/settings?view=graph-rest-beta) that represents the current required settings for a user to use the [analytics API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/useranalytics?view=graph-rest-beta).

Introduced the new [activityStatistics](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/activitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type and the following new resource types that are derived from it: [callActivityStatistics](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta), [chatActivityStatistics](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/chatactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta),[emailActivityStatistics](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/emailactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta), [focusActivityStatistics](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/focusactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta), and [meetingActivityStatistics](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the [settings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user-settings?view=graph-rest-beta) entity and the following CRUD methods:
[Get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-get-settings?view=graph-rest-beta)
[Update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-update-settings?view=graph-rest-beta)

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: People APIs,Get relevant information about people
ChangeList.Description: Added the [People APIs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/person?view=graph-rest-1.0) to v1.0. For details about the People API, see [Get relevant information about people](people-example.md).
ChangeList.Target: People APIs,Get relevant information about people

ChangeList.Description: Added People.Read.All permission. To learn more, please see [Permissions](permissions-reference.md).
Added the [personType](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/persontype?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
The [scoredEmailAddress](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/scoredemailaddress?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource replaced the **rankedEmailAddress** resource.

The [person](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/person?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource was updated as follows:
  • The **scoredEmailAddresses** property (a collection of [scoredEmailAddress](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/scoredemailaddress?view=graph-rest-1.0) type) replaced the **emailAddresses** property
  • The **jobTitle** property replaced the **title** property
  • Removed **sources** and **mailboxType** properties
  • The **personType** property is now of [personType](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/persontype?view=graph-rest-1.0) type instead of string type and replaces functionality of the previous **sources** and **mailboxType** properties
  • Added **imAddress** property
Removed the **personDataSource** resource.

Added [Shared API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/insights-shared?view=graph-rest-beta).
New resources:
[sharingDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/insights-sharingdetail?view=graph-rest-beta)
[insightIdentity](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/insights-insightidentity?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added [Used API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/insights-used?view=graph-rest-beta).
New resources:
[usageDetails](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/insights-usagedetails?view=graph-rest-beta)

New **Type** property in the:
[resourceVisualization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/insights-resourcevisualization?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the following entities:, **workingWith**, **trendingAround**,

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Upcoming changes to Contacts and People APIs
ChangeList.Description: Property _WebSite_ is renamed to _Websites_. For details, see [Upcoming changes to Contacts and People APIs](https://developer.microsoft.com/office/blogs/upcoming-changes-to-contacts-and-people-apis/).
ChangeList.Target: Upcoming changes to Contacts and People APIs

ChangeList.Description: Added new properties _birthday_, _personNotes_, _isFavorite_, _phones_, _permission_, _postalAddresses_,_websites_,_yomiCompany_, _department_, _profession_, _mailboxType_ and _personType_.
Added new enum types _physicalAddressType_, _webSite_, _phone_ and _webSiteType_.
